azurerm_api_management_api_version_set.description: Manages an API Version Set within an API Management Service.

name.description: The name of the API Version Set. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

api_management_name.description: The name of the [API Management Service](api_management.html

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the parent API Management Service exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

display_name.description: The display name of this API Version Set.

versioning_scheme.description: Specifies where in an Inbound HTTP Request that the API Version should be read from. Possible values are `Header`, `Query` and `Segment`.

description.description: The description of API Version Set.

version_header_name.description: The name of the Header which should be read from Inbound Requests which defines the API Version.
version_header_name.notes: This must be specified when `versioning_scheme` is set to `Header`.

version_query_name.description: The name of the Query String which should be read from Inbound Requests which defines the API Version.
version_query_name.notes: This must be specified when `versioning_scheme` is set to `Query`.

id.description: The ID of the API Version Set.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management API Version Set.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management API Version Set.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management API Version Set.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management API Version Set.
